data.comment: The match has started at Gewiss Stadium.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Sampdoria will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atalanta.
Atalanta drive upfield and Josip Ilicic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Atalanta's Papu Gomez breaks free at Gewiss Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 5, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In Bergamo Atalanta drive forward through Papu Gomez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Sampdoria.
In the minute 7, Papu Gomez (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Papu Gomez (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sampdoria take a 0-1 lead thanks to Fabio Quagliarella.
Mikkel Damsgaard with an assist there.
In the minute 14, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Atalanta.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Atalanta's Sam Lammers gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Atalanta's Josip Ilicic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Free kick Atalanta.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sam Lammers (Atalanta) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Gewiss Stadium.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Gewiss Stadium.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 30, Atalanta push forward at Gewiss Stadium and Josip Ilicic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sampdoria defence.
Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) has received a yellow card from Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 32, In Bergamo Atalanta attack through Papu Gomez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
In the minute 34, Lorenzo Tonelli for Sampdoria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 34, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a throw-in for Sampdoria, close to Atalanta's area.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
In the minute 38, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bergamo, Josip Ilicic of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 44, An attacking Sampdoria player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
At Gewiss Stadium, Johan Mojica has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Attention is being given to Sampdoria’s Gaston Ramirez and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 45, Fabio Quagliarella (Sampdoria) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Gaston Ramirez is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Atalanta defence as Jakub Jankto fires in a strike for Sampdoria.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Josip Ilicic (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Sam Lammers with Duvan Zapata.
Atalanta make their second substitution with Rafael Toloi replacing Bosko Sutalo.
The home team have replaced Johan Mojica with Robin Gosens. This is the third substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
In the minute 47, In Bergamo, Papu Gomez of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atalanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
Maya Yoshida for Sampdoria has been booked by Gianpaolo Calvarese and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 48, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Atalanta.
Atalanta drives forward and Papu Gomez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Atalanta drive upfield and Duvan Zapata gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
In the minute 56, Atalanta are pushing forward but Josip Ilicic's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 59, Goal! Morten Thorsby extends Sampdoria's lead to 0-2 in Bergamo with a header.
That's a fine assist from Jakub Jankto.
In the minute 60, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
Hans Hateboer is replacing Fabio Depaoli for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Atalanta's Papu Gomez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 62, Atalanta's Josip Ilicic is whistled for offside at Gewiss Stadium.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a fifth substitution, with Ruslan Malinovskyi replacing Marten De Roon.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Bergamo.
Keita Balde is on a sub for Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Atalanta.
Claudio Ranieri is making the team's second substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Valerio Verre replacing Gaston Ramirez.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi has been booked in Bergamo.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta are coming forward and Robin Gosens gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Keita Balde (Sampdoria) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 71, Jakub Jankto is booked for the away team.
Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
Mehdi Leris is replacing Mikkel Damsgaard for Sampdoria at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 73, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Atalanta throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Mario Pasalic's header is off-target for Atalanta.
In the minute 74, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Free kick Atalanta.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Atalanta have been given a penalty at Gewiss Stadium...
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Duvan Zapata's penalty pulls one back for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Sampdoria.
Atalanta's Papu Gomez misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
In the minute 86, In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Gewiss Stadium, Jose Luis Palomino has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Gewiss Stadium.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 89, Sampdoria’s Jakub Jankto is on his feet again at Gewiss Stadium.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jakub Jankto.
Free kick Sampdoria.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Jakub Jankto extends Sampdoria's lead to 1-3.
Keita Balde instrumental with a fine assist.
